summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Rinse-Off Eye Makeup Remover Solvent quickly removes eye makeup, from lashes to brows. Allows for easy makeup touch-ups.
details: DetailsBenefitsFast-acting eye makeup remover is perfect for quick makeup changes, touchups, repairs.Cleans eye area easily without disturbing other makeup.No rubbing necessary. Blur-free, sting-free.Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilDenatured alcoholSynthetic colorsSLSSLESSulfatesGlutenFragranceItem 2153848How To UseMoisten cotton ball with Rinse-Off Eye Makeup Remover Solvent or use a cotton swab for spot work. Sweep over eye makeup. Tissue off or rinse with water. Follow with Clinique Take the Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, PEG-32, Butylene Glycol, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, PEG-6, Trisodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Moisten cotton ball with Rinse-Off Eye Makeup Remover Solvent or use a cotton swab for spot work. Sweep over eye makeup. Tissue off or rinse with water. Follow with Clinique Take the Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover.
ingredients: Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: Best eye makeup remover i have used.  Not greasy--does a great job.

reviews.headline: Long time user of this product.
reviews.comments: I have used this product for a long time and will never use any other. I have tried many others, but nothing compares.

reviews.headline: Yes will buy this again.
reviews.comments: I bought this because I bought an eye liner from Smashbox that is water proof. It takes it off nice and easily with a few sweeps. Clinique is always a good product. I like that I can buy it right at the Ulta store when I get my other make up needs.

reviews.headline: Would definitely buy again
reviews.comments: This is the only eye makeup remover that does not burn my eyes.

reviews.headline: Works great for lash extensions
reviews.comments: I use this product to clean my lashes and it works great. To all the bad reviews saying it dosent remove waterproof makeup… its water based. You need an oil based product for waterproof stuff. Yall are buying the wrong thing and blaming the product.. Anyways this product is gentle and work well. Would def buy again.

reviews.headline: Best ever.
reviews.comments: I have used this to remove my eyeliner and mascara since I was a teenager in the 1980's. I usually use it with a qtip after washing my face to get the remnants from under my eyes. It's not oily, doesn't burn or leave a film. I have also used it to remove sharpie from my kid's face very easily.

reviews.headline: didnt work
reviews.comments: it literally did nothing to my skin. when i pour the product out a bunch comes out at a time and it leaks too. it also burned my eyes a bit

reviews.headline: My favorite!
reviews.comments: This is my favorite eye makeup remover because it is not oily and leaves no residue. Works great to remove heavy eyeliner and mascara without having to scrub to get the makeup off. I highly recommend!!

reviews.headline: Holy grail
reviews.comments: This removes all my eye makeup without being oily or greasy.  I dont like oily removers.  Ive tried a lot and this is the best!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: This is the BEST eye makeup remover I have ever used.  Most makeup removers leave a greasy or oily residue and this is like water but breaks through the makeup the best.  I am very upset if Clinique is getting rid of this version of their remover.

reviews.headline: Won't be buying again!
reviews.comments: I have been using Clinique's Naturally Gentle eye makeup remover cream for several years now, and it has always worked like a charm, so of course, it has been discontinued. I tried this product, and it is a total joke! It does NOT remove eye makeup, and left the skin around my eyes feeling tight and dry. I will be returning this product and looking elsewhere. I don't understand why Clinique had to eliminate Naturally Gentle from their product line. So disappointed!

reviews.headline: Very Disappointed
reviews.comments: This product was horrible. It did not remove my eye makeup at all! plus it irritated and burned my eyes. Awful product.  I usually love clinique products  but I was very disappointed in this product.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I have been using this product for over 30 years.it works great for sensitive eyes.

reviews.headline: This DOES NOT remove eye makeup
reviews.comments: I had the purple bottle and ran out of it. I had a full size bottle of this one and I NEED to return it for the purple one. It barely removes my eyeshadow and definitely DOES NOT remove my BAD GAL BANG Mascara (it is not even waterproof). I honestly came here to see if I was using it wrong.... I am not.

reviews.headline: Great but one thing
reviews.comments: It's a great makeup remover, but it leaves some mascara left on the face. I just pick the rest off with my fingers, Would recommend!

reviews.headline: Works great
reviews.comments: Takes eye makeup off with no scrubbing .  Gently wipes away

reviews.headline: Useless
reviews.comments: I was so disappointed when I tried this. I would much rather use a makeup remover.

reviews.headline: Great but…..
reviews.comments: I love this product.  But really wish the bottle was recyclable!   Come on Clinique!  Get with us on saving the earth!

reviews.headline: I buy this again and again!
reviews.comments: Excellent for removing eye makeup of all types.  Have used it for may years.  Does not dry out the skin around the eye or lid.

reviews.headline: Best make-up remover of all times
reviews.comments: I can't believe anyone can say a bad thing about the product!! I'm 62 bee using it for my life and it's the best thing out there

Love the no oily residue on my eyes
Removes eye makeup and liner easily
does a great job cleaning eye makeup off

faceoff_positive.comments: This product works great on waterproof eye make up. It is light, so you don't get the greasy, heavy feel that some eye remover products give. It does seem to run out rather quickly, though. I believe I had a bottle for just over a month until it was empty. The only con that I have is the price.
faceoff_positive.headline: Works Great, But Pricey

faceoff_negative.comments: I've used Clinique's Eye Makeup Solvent for years. What I like best about it is that it does not leave my eyes greasy after I remove my makeup. It also washes off easily. Most of my eye makeup does come off, but I usually do have a residue ring around my eyes. I've learned that this product is basically useless for any type of waterproof mascara, but I intend to switch from waterproof to regular mascara.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not greasy!
